0.1.name: wordpress/what-would-bertrand-russel-say
0.1.description:
This is not just a plugin, it symbolizes the doubt and disillusionment of an entire generation summed up in the quotes mostly put forth by Bertrand Russel. When activated you will randomly see a quote from Bertrand Russel in the upper right of your admin screen on every page.

http://nikos-web-development.netai.net/
